item.title: 中国在新疆秘密修建大型关押中心
item.description: The following is a Chinese translation of a BuzzFeed News investigation on Xinjiang internment camps. This project was supported by the Open Technology Fund, the Pulitzer Center, and the Eyebeam Center for the Future of …
